column9: Generally speaking, the drug does help me with restless body syndrome.  My case seem severe and I take 8 mg of generic Requip each night. I also take gababapenten and trazadone.  On top of that I drink three glasses or so of wine each evening to get to the point of being able to fall asleep.  In the morning I take 259 mg of Nuvagil to help with the previous evening's drugs.  I also have sleep apnea.I could probably live with this (for a time) but I am and have been all my life a very sexual person.  Requip does increase sexual "urges" but then shuts down (for the most part) a man's ability to (a) hold an erection and (b) ejaculate.  A viscous combo.  I'm so frustrated with Requip and would love to find either another drug to takes its place or another program to get off the stuff all together.  I hate racing around my house all night, eating to help me in some way, and then finally at 6 AM finally finding a way to get to sleep.  So, if you have a healthy libido and have RLS (or whatever) my advice is to take no drug and just resign yourself to not having a good life -- except on those rare occasions, you can have quality sex and truly enjoy your sexual body.
